thread.title: Oscars 2017: All the Fashion Looks From the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: All the Fashion Looks From the Red Carpet

title: Oscars 2017: All the Fashion Looks From the Red Carpet

persons.name: steve granitz dakota johnson dakota johnson
kevin mazur leslie mann leslie mann

text: Charlize Theron wore a Dior couture dress from the spring 2017 collection. Steve Granitz Naomie Harris wore Raf Simons's first red carpet gown for Calvin Klein. Frazer Harrison Brie Larson looked glamorous in a velvet Oscar de la Renta gown. Getty Images Priyanka Chopra Priyanka Chopra turned heads in a geometric metallic gown by Ralph & Russo with Lorraine Schwartz jewelry. Getty Images Viola Davis stunned in a red Armani Privé gown and sparkly clutch. Frazer Harrison Nicole Kidman sparkled in a custom Armani Privé gown. Frazer Harrison The La La Land star stunned in Givenchy couture. Frazer Harrison Alicia Vikander wore a ruffled Louis Vuitton gown. Steve Granitz Halle Berry stunned in an Atelier Versace gown. Kevin Mazur Scarlett Johansson looked pretty in pink in this flowy gown. Kevin Mazur The Manchester by the Sea star wore a gown by Louis Vuitton. Steve Granitz Janelle Monae wore an Elie Saab couture gown straight from the runway. Steve Granitz Dakota Johnson Dakota Johnson stood out on the red carpet in a Gucci gown and jewelry by Cartier. Jessica Biel Jessica Biel sparkled in a KaufmanFranco gown and Tiffany & Co. necklace. Frazer Harrison Octavia Spencer looked fabulous in this Marchesa gown. Steve Granitz Kirsten Dunst showed off her slim waist in a simple black gown by Dior. Frazer Harrison Ginnifer Goodwin looked radiant in a Zuhair Murad dress and shoes by Sophia Webster. Chrissy Teigen The model sparkled in a Zuhair Murad couture gown. Kevin Mazur The 13th director looked regal in this statement gown by Lebanese brand Ashi Studio. Kevin Mazur Leslie Mann Leslie Mann looked like Belle from Beauty and the Beast in this citrus-hued gown by Zac Posen. Kevin Mazur The Hidden Figures star look glamorous in this chic navy gown by Alberta Ferretti. Kevin Mazur Emma Roberts channeled Old Hollywood in an eco-conscious Armani Privé gown. Sofia Boutella Sofia Boutella wore a Chanel couture gown from the spring 2017 collection . Steve Granitz Karlie Kloss channeled Gwyneth Paltrow at the 2012 Oscars in this cape-gown by Stella McCartney. Frazer Harrison The actress stunned in a Ralph & Russo gown. Darby Stanchfield The Scandal actress complemented her ethereal Georges Chakra couture gown with a pair of statement earrings. Ruth Negga The Loving actress stepped out in a custom Valentino gown with jewelry by Irene Neuwirth and an ACLU ribbon. Isabelle Huppert The French actress sparkled in an Armani Privé gown with Repossi jewels and Christian Louboutin shoes. Felicity Jones The actress looked like a ballerina in a Dior couture gown. Olivia Culpo Olivia Culpo stepped out in a Marchesa gown. Fashion From Barbra Streisand in a sheer jumpsuit to Bjork's swan gown, take a look at some of the most surprising Oscar red carpet outfits of all time. #
